tachyon.worker.block

Class BlockStoreLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.block.BlockStoreLocation

  • public final class BlockStoreLocation
extends Object
    Where to store a block within a block store. Currently, this is a wrapper on an integer representing the tier to put this block.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlockStoreLocation(int tierAlias, int tierLevel, int dirIndex)

    • Method Detail

      • anyTier

        public static BlockStoreLocation anyTier()
        Convenience method to return the block store location representing any dir in any tier.
        Returns:
        a BlockStoreLocation of any dir in any tier

      • anyDirInTier

        public static BlockStoreLocation anyDirInTier(int tierAlias)
        Convenience method to return the block store location representing any dir in the tier.
        Parameters:
        tierAlias - The tier this returned block store alias will represent
        Returns:
        a BlockStoreLocation of any dir in the specified tier

      • getStorageDirId

        public long getStorageDirId()
        Gets the storage directory id of the location. The first 8 bits are tier level, next 8 are the tier alias and last 16 represent the directory index.
        Returns:
        the storage directory id of the location

      • tierAlias

        public int tierAlias()
        Gets the tier alias of the location.
        Returns:
        the tier alias of the location, -1 for any tier

      • tierLevel

        public int tierLevel()
        Gets the tier level of the location.
        Returns:
        the tier level of the location, -1 for unknown level

      • dir

        public int dir()
        Gets the directory index of the location.
        Returns:
        the directory index of the location, -1 for any directory

      • belongTo

        public boolean belongTo(BlockStoreLocation location)
        Returns whether this location belongs to the specific location. Location A belongs to B when tier and dir of A are all in the range of B respectively.
        Parameters:
        location - the target BlockStoreLocation
        Returns:
        true when this BlockStoreLocation belongs to the target, otherwise false

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Converts the location to a human readable form.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        a human readable string representing the information of this block store location

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object object)
        Compares to a specific object.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        object - the object to compare
        Returns:
        true if object is also BlockStoreLocation and represents the same tier and dir
